pageContent: Introduction: The aim of this study was to evaluate toxicity, oncological and functional outcome, and quality of life after salvage radiotherapy for recurrent prostate cancer after high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) therapy.

metaData.source:
Salvage brachytherapy for locally recurrent prostate cancer after external beam radiotherapy
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/26112477/
